667 to 671 Eighth Ave., west side, between West 42nd and 43rd Streets, showing an excavation where No. 669 formerly stood. This set consists of a negative and a positive.

660, bo2, ou4, odo Eighth Avenue, at and aojoining the N.E. corner of 42nd Street. No. 664 is one of the few remaining frame houses

May 1, 1936.

(3)
The same, after demolition. The 1-story building (in the centre) occupied by the United Cigar Stores Company is the only floor left of what was formerly a 3-story building. The upper two stories were demolished together with the
other buildings which occupied this site.
July 2, 1936.
P. L. Sperr.
